text: Boriss Bogdaškins (born 21 February 1990) is a Latvian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Valmiera and the Latvia national team. ==Career== Bogdaškins made his international debut for Latvia on 6 September 2019 in a UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying match against Austria, which finished as a 0–6 away loss. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !colspan=3|Latvia |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2019||1||0 |- !Total!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Riga Category:Latvian footballers Category:Latvia under-21 international footballers Category:Latvia international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:SK Blāzma players Category:FK Jelgava players Category:Riga FC players Category:Valmieras FK players Category:Latvian Higher League players
title: Boriss Bogdaškins
